name: The Duck's Domain!
description:
You are trapped in the Ducks Domain!

Collect 15 ducks and the Bright Escape Cloud will appear,

but there are 30 in total.

Also avoid the Mother Duck,

she is not happy with you.

Good Luck!

Controls:

Movement: W/A/S/D

Sprint: Left Shift

Inventory: Q

Collect Item: E
